Based on your preferences, I recommend watching "Ocean's Thirteen" and "Ocean's十二". These movies feature a group of skilled thieves who work together to pull off elaborate heists. The movies are known for their action-packed sequences, complex characters, and engaging plotlines.

If you prefer something different, you might want to consider watching "Point Break" and "The Andromeda Strain".

In "Point Break", the main character, Johnnie, is a skilled thief who has been living on the edge of society. When he meets his younger brother, James, who is also a skilled thief, Johnnie realizes that they are not alone in their criminal activities.

In "The Andromeda Strain", the main characters, Dr. Alan McNeil and Dr. Roberta Mc Neil, work at an elite research institution that studies extraterrestrial life. When they discover what appears to be a deadly extraterrestrial life form, Dr. Mc Neil and Dr. Mc Neil quickly realize that they are not alone in their mission to stop the deadly extraterrestrial life form from spreading any further.
